Join Our Discord

About

A group in the greater Sacramento County area associated with DEF CON Groups for hackers, makers, tinkerers and security enthusiasts/professionals/students to meet and share projects/ideas. Current leader is RadicalKjax, please reach out to her or any of the listed social media accounts below for any inquiries.

Location

Sacramento, California
United States

This is a preview of the modernized DC916 website. The full site includes:

  • Console typing effects
  • Modern card-based layouts
  • Interactive elements
  • Custom 404 page
  • And much more!
